title: Rutabaga Knight

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a target each night. You'll set their defence to Vulnerable for the night, but protect their closest alive neighbours with Basic defence.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your visits are Astral and don't count toward Vulnerable defence.
- You cannot be protected by your own ability.
- You may self-target.

desc:
Post 3440
*I'll protect this Town with all my rutabagas.*
